name: valueset-replacement-feed
description: Codes representing possible values for the Provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth element

designation.value: The caregiver is giving sufficient replacement feeds (approximately 60 ml per feed, 8 times per day for a young infant up to one month of age; approximately 90 ml per feed, 7 times per day for a young infant between 1 and 2 months of age)

The caregiver is not giving sufficient replacement feeds (i.e. less than 60 ml per feed, 8 times per day for a young infant up to one month of age; less than 90 ml per feed, 7 times per day for a young infant between 1 and 2 months of age)
